text: Cristian Salvador González (born 20 November 1994) is a Spanish footballer who plays for Sporting de Gijón as a central midfielder. ==Club career== Born in Zamora, Castile and León, Salvador represented Zamora CF as a youth. On 7 April 2012, aged only 17, he made his senior debut by starting in a 2–0 home win against Sestao River for the Segunda División B championship. Salvador was promoted to the first team ahead of the 2012–13 season, and began to appear more regularly in the following campaigns. He scored his first senior goal on 5 January 2014, netting the equalizer in a 1–1 home draw against CD Guijuelo. On 31 July 2015, after Zamora's relegation, Salvador joined fellow third-tier club CD Lealtad. However, Zamora announced that they retained the player seven days later, but he signed for Sestao on 1 September after rescinding his contract. On 28 July 2016 Salvador moved to Sporting de Gijón, being initially assigned to the reserves in Tercera División. He made his first team debut on 21 December, coming on as a late substitute for Nacho Cases in a 1–3 away loss against SD Eibar for the season's Copa del Rey. Salvador was definitely promoted to the main squad in Segunda División ahead of the 2018–19 season, after agreeing to a new three-year contract. ==Career Statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Zamora |2011-12 |Segunda División B |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |2012-13 |Segunda División B |11||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||11||0 |- |2013-14 |Segunda División B |16||2||0||0||colspan="2"|—||16||2 |- |2014-15 |Segunda División B |33||1||1||0||colspan="2"|—||34||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !61!!3!!1!!0!!0!!0!!62!!1 |- |Sestao River |2015-16 |Segunda División B |29||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||29||0 |- |Sporting Gijón |2016-17 |La Liga |0||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |rowspan="3"|Sporting Gijón B |2016-17 |Tercera División |38||4||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||38||4 |- |2017-18 |Segunda División B |32||3||colspan="2"|—||4||1||36||4 |- !colspan="2"|Total !70!!7!!0!!0!!4!!1!!74!!8 |- |rowspan="3"|Sporting Gijón |2018-19 |Segunda División |30||1||3||0||colspan="2"|—||33||1 |- |2019-20 |Segunda División |29||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||30||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !59!!1!!4!!0!!0!!0!!63!!1 |- !colspan="3"|Career Total !219!!11!!6!!0!!4!!1!!229!!12 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Zamora, Spain Category:Spanish footballers Category:Castilian-Manchegan footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Zamora CF footballers Category:Sestao River footballers Category:Sporting de Gijón B players Category:Sporting de Gijón players
